about_the_game:
Immerse yourself amongst the sounds of Worldless, this carefully crafted soundtrack from Berlinist and BeGun transports listeners to a place amongst the stars.

The soundtrack features 18 unique tracks that collectively can be described as an ambient, sometimes dark, and melancholic flux of sound that has a precise function: elevate the atmosphere of each level and at the same time try to convey a precise mood to the player.
detailed_description:
Immerse yourself amongst the sounds of Worldless, this carefully crafted soundtrack from Berlinist and BeGun transports listeners to a place amongst the stars.

The soundtrack features 18 unique tracks that collectively can be described as an ambient, sometimes dark, and melancholic flux of sound that has a precise function: elevate the atmosphere of each level and at the same time try to convey a precise mood to the player.

name: Worldless Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself amongst the sounds of Worldless, with over 60 minutes of this carefully crafted music from Berlinist.
